item.title: Windows Library Code
item.description: Intro I thought I will make a guide about windows library code.. The target audience are beginners that want to understand more about windows reverse engineering, development and compilation. I tried to make this guide as simple as possible. A “Library” is a term used in computer science for a collection of pre-written code / variables. Libraries are pretty useful for developers because it saves development time. There are 2 types of libraries:
